entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
